name: aPODD Foundation
goal:
aPODD's mission is to accelerate the development of new therapeutic agents that are more effective and safer to treat cancer in children.
We work with academic institutions, companies and other charities to facilitate translational research and drug development efforts, by providing advice, sharing information and providing funds for specific projects
euInitiatives:
aPODD is among the founding members of Unite2Cure and we have been very active in lobbying activities to support Unite2Cure's mission to reform the paediatric medicine regulation in a way that it would better support paediatric oncology drug development

We are are also part of the ACCELERATE, multistakeholder platform together with ITTC, SIOPE and Unite2Cure
